post.body: I couldn't interrupt cuz I left my phonr in the cab :-(
or maybe they do and I have to watch more TV. :-)
I was watching that! that was awsome, ESPN needs to do that with more games, like the '88 world series.
lol no. I was just sayin that its cold there.
wellllllllll...... Ask me in mineappolis.
they were fuzzy. They were earmuffs.
I know. I just bought a jacket but earmuffs?
little bros are cool.... And so are big sisters. :-)
the blackberry has enough juice for one of these. --> :-)
Ooooooh.... BevMo don't care who they sell to. They practically give their stuff away. So don't take it personally. ;-)
unfortunatelty I am not kidding. Sad times my friend.
they moved them all around and renamed them with the merge with Sirius
thx for the trip down memory lane, now for my trip up 7th st... catch you later #phx
thats ironic, that is about the time and the reason I stopped too. I was on a mission to beat Metroid if it meant playing sick.
oh yeah.... lol and @onb I noticed that too, I think they did.
you have off the wall paul? I was into those too and TMNT and anything else that had a card associated with it. Anyone remember POGS?
I had an inside track on that one. @tdhurst '89 upper deck rising stars. .... ooo remember the reverse negative?
thats like getting a Ken Griffey Jr. rookie card only better! ... unless your name is @tdhurst. He would disagree.
whoa... the other guy didn't even call him out like that!
you see that I am 1st 2day on http://twit.pix.ly ? u should b proud. Thought Id let u know b4 @strebel does a weighted avg.
only the cool kids
I am sorry man... you and your family are in our thoughts.
I think your living the PSA video you use for the help group. Lol. Have a gr8 day.
please. I have a cpl traditional old school agency guys I'll fly to Jersey. Prolly reading the paper right now. ;-)
I saw that this morning on the avatar battles. Thanks for hooking up that avatar. Proof the soft edit process workee!
I like that. I might borrow that. : {
some1 just tweeted ur article on SrCharles. Freaking funny. btw back 2 basix on the st sched, the vCal wasnt parsing right.
geez... are ppl aiming for the metro?
oh.... Kewl.
cool thx. So I take it I wouldnt be the only one that wants to see 2Pac come out of hiding for a film. Hehe. #2PacLives :-)
what was that all about? The pitching? Who's. Sorry. I am a baseball addict.
Fo sho! Thx.
cool trivia man. Keep it up!
playing with microformats.... need sleep: http://tinyurl.com/8qh7ly
shameless plug for Hilton... they take care of thier rewards members.
K. I seriously just walked passed a guy w/ earmuffs ... In AZ.
Allright kids. Nickle metal hydride is drying up. Be back in a couple of hrs. Gotta charge batttrie after dinner and nap. Peace!
Fyi. Due to the current economic condition the Yard House no longer has curly straws for kids... Or big kids. :-(
Just got carded. Must be my attempt at the "Robert Downey Jr. is Ironman" look.
http://twitpic.com/sncz - Howd you get up there kitty?
Looking for trouble a little earlier than usual.
Not sure if I like this pic of Todd Mc Farlane. Looks like he has a gun to his head. http://tinyurl.com/6jmnmj

anyone getting a blank last page of the wp insert image wizard in 2.7?
Booooo fake @wayne_gretzky Yay! @THE_REAL_SHAQ

I think my stache is getting longer than it was for mustache May. He he...
Really cool design portfolio. Check out the pallete picker on the right: http://recom-cgi.de/
wow.... I just noticed that I have been working w/ out music.
Peoria Sports Complex is still named .... Peoria Sports Complex :-)
The proper name of the new Dodger Spring Training Facility is not Glendale Sports Complex but Camelback Ranch... I stand corrected.
Did you guys know that there was a bowl game called the Salad Bowl played right here in #phx. Seriously... Google "salad bowl game phoenix"
I think I'm gonna have lunch by the ball park. Just cuz.
Is it lame that I want to see the Notorios BIG movie? Looks good.
Running some errands, running to lunch using the lightrail. :-)
B4 I rest I figured out my issue with brightkite was the privacy settings. If set to private always shows home. #fyi.
Nap time. Sleeps going to be jacked up for work tomorrow.
I'm at 18250 N Cave Creek Rd (Phoenix, AZ , USA) - http://bkite.com/03oz1
http://twitpic.com/ys78 - Hot air balloon taking off
Rockin' out to Stevie Winwood's Higher Love (nice) at the Yard House with my lunch.
